name: Adaptability
description: Boosts the power of the Pokémon's moves that match its type.

name: Blaze
description: Boosts the power of Fire-type moves when HP is low.

name: Damp
description: Prevents any explosions on the dungeon floor.

name: Guts
description: Boosts Attack if the Pokémon has any status problems.

name: No Guard
description: Allows Pokémon to ignore stat modifications to accuracy and evasion.

name: Overgrow
description: Boosts the power of Grass-type moves when HP is low.

name: Pick Up
description: Finds items if the Pokémon is not holding anything.

name: Rock Head
description: Prevents damage from the recoil of moves such as Take Down.

name: Run Away
description: Becomes terrified and flees when HP gets low. Leaders will resist this urge.

name: Torrent
description: Boosts the power of Water-type moves when HP is low.
